about.title: About
about.subtitle: PUNKHAZARD — Electronic engineering, PCB, embedded systems & robots

mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: PUNKHAZARD designs and develops custom electronic solutions for artistic, interactive and stage projects. From prototype to industrialization, we accompany your ideas from conception to realization.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.content: Specialized in PCB design, embedded programming and robotic integration, we work with modern technologies (STM32, ESP32, ROS/ROS2) to create innovative devices adapted to performing arts and interactive installations.

collaborations.title: Collaborations
collaborations.content: We collaborate with artists, institutions and international festivals. Our AS-SIMT / EightOS motion sensors are used by artist NSDOS in performances and have been presented at major events such as Gwangju Biennale, IMPACT (Théâtre de Liège) and HOT‑SHOP 14 (ECCO Leather).

approach.title: Approach
approach.content: Our methodology combines research, development and artistic creation. We favor open source solutions, complete documentation and personalized support for each project.

cgv.title: Terms and Conditions of Sale
cgv.metaDescription: PUNK HAZARD terms and conditions of sale: orders, delivery, payment, warranty and contact.

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: These Terms and Conditions of Sale (TCS) govern the relationship between PUNKHAZARD and its customers for the sale of audio and artistic equipment, as well as for electronic engineering services.

orders.title: 2. Orders
orders.content: Any order implies unreserved acceptance of these TCS. Prices are indicated in euros including tax. PUNKHAZARD reserves the right to modify its prices at any time, it being understood that the applicable price is that in force on the day of the order.

delivery.title: 3. Delivery
delivery.content: Delivery times are given for information only. In case of delivery delay, the customer will be informed as soon as possible. The risks of loss or damage to products are transferred to the customer at the time of delivery.

payment.title: 4. Payment
payment.content: Payment is made according to the terms agreed at the time of order. For custom services, a deposit may be required.

withdrawal.title: 5. Right of withdrawal
withdrawal.content: In accordance with current legislation, the customer has a period of 14 days to exercise their right of withdrawal, except for personalized or custom products.

warranty.title: 6. Warranty
warranty.content: Products benefit from the legal warranty of conformity and the warranty against hidden defects. For service provision, the warranty covers design and execution defects.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these TCS, you can contact us at: contact@punkhazard.org
